TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Utf8JsonReader extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, read-only access to the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
`Utf8JsonReader`在不使用缓存的情况下按顺序处理文本, 默认情况下严格遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)。
当`Utf8JsonReader`遇到无效的 JSON 时, 它<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonException>会引发, 其中包含基本错误信息, 如行号和行中的字节位置。
由于此类型是 ref 结构, 因此不直接支持 async。 但是, 它确实支持重入操作读取不完整的数据, 并在显示更多数据后继续读取。
为了能够在读取或允许跳过注释时设置最大深度, 请创建一个<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState>实例并将其传递给读取器。

new System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader : System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence<byte> * bool * System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState -> System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader

Docs.param: The UTF-8 encoded JSON text to process.
when the input sequence contains the entire data to process. only if it's known that the input span contains partial data with more data to follow.
If this is the first call to the constructor, pass in a default state. Otherwise, capture the state from the previous instance of the and pass that back.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
由于此类型是一个 ref 结构, 因此它是一个仅堆栈类型, 并且 ref 结构的所有限制都适用于它。 这是构造函数接受的<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState>原因。

MemberSignature.Value: public Utf8JsonReader (ReadOnlySpan<byte> jsonData, bool isFinalBlock, System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState state);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> jsonData, bool isFinalBlock, valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState state) cil managed
Public Sub New (jsonData As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), isFinalBlock As Boolean, state As JsonReaderState)
public: Utf8JsonReader(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> jsonData, bool isFinalBlock, System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState state);
new System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader : ReadOnlySpan<byte> * bool * System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState -> System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader

Docs.param: The UTF-8 encoded JSON text to process.
when the input span contains the entire data to process. only if it's known that the input span contains partial data with more data to follow.

A struct that contains the reader state. On the first call to the constructor, it should reflect a default state; otherwise, it should capture the state from the previous instance instance of the and pass that back.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
由于此类型是一个 ref 结构, 因此它是一个仅堆栈类型, 并且 ref 结构的所有限制都适用于它。 这是构造函数接受的<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonReaderState>原因。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesConsumed As Long
public: property long BytesConsumed { long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the total number of bytes consumed by the so far for the current instance of the with the given UTF-8 encoded input text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentDepth As Integer
public: property int CurrentDepth { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the depth of the current token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
`CurrentDepth`属性跟踪到目前为止处理的 JSON 文本中的嵌套对象/数组的递归深度。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentState As JsonReaderState
public: property System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState CurrentState { System::Text::Json::JsonReaderState get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current snapshot of the state that must be captured by the caller and passed back in to the constructor with more data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
与 (ref 结构) 不同的是, 状态在异步/等待边界内可能会保留, 因此, 此类型需要在继续使用的新实例<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader>之前, 提供对更多数据的异步支持。 <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader>

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasValueSequence As Boolean
public: property bool HasValueSequence { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates which Value property to use to get the token value.
Docs.value: 如果应使用来获取标记值, 则为。 如果应使用, 则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
如果`HasValueSequence`为`false` ,<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ValueSequence>则为空。 因此, 请使用<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ValueSpan>属性读取令牌值。
对于中`ReadOnlySpan<byte>`的输入数据, 此始终返回`false`。 对于中的输入数据`ReadOnlySequence<byte>`, 仅当令牌`true`值跨越多个段, 因此不能表示为范围时, 这种情况才会返回。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFinalBlock As Boolean
public: property bool IsFinalBlock { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the mode of this instance of the which indicates whether all the JSON data was provided or there is more data to come.
Docs.value: 如果读取器是用输入跨距构造的, 或者是包含要处理的整个 JSON 数据的序列, 则为。 如果读取器是使用输入范围或序列构造的, 则该输入范围或序列可能包含部分 JSON 数据, 并具有更多数据。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Position As SequencePosition
public: property SequencePosition Position { SequencePosition get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current within the provided UTF-8 encoded input ReadOnlySequence<byte> or a default if the struct was constructed with a ReadOnlySpan<byte>.
Docs.value: 在提供的 utf-8 编码输入 ReadOnlySequence<字节>内的当前值, 或者, 如果结构是使用 ReadOnlySpan<字节>构造的, 则为默认值。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Read() cil managed

Docs.summary: Read the next JSON token from the input source.
Docs.returns: if the token was read successfully; otherwise, .
Docs.exception:
An invalid JSON token according to the JSON RFC is encountered.
-or-
The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Skip() cil managed

Docs.summary: Skips the children of the current JSON token.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
当<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.TokenType> 为<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.PropertyName?displayProperty=nameWithType>时, 读取器首先移动到属性值。
当<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.TokenType> (最初或前进后) 为<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartObject?displayProperty=nameWithtype>或<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartArray?displayProperty=nameWithType>时, 读取器前进到匹配<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.EndObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>的或<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.EndArray?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
对于所有其他标记类型, 读取器不会移动。 在下一次调用<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.Read>后, 读取器将在下一个值 (在数组中时)、下一个属性名称 (在对象中) 或结束数组/对象标记。

Docs.exception: The reader was given partial data with more data to follow (that is, is ).

An invalid JSON token was encountered while skipping, according to the JSON RFC.
- or -
The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TokenStartIndex As Long
public: property long TokenStartIndex { long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the index that the last processed JSON token starts at (within the given UTF-8 encoded input text), skipping any white space.
Docs.value: 给定 UTF-8 编码输入文本中最后处理的 JSON 标记的起始索引。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
对于 JSON 字符串 (包括属性名称), 此值指向开始引号之前。
对于注释, 此值指向第一个注释分隔符之前 (即 "/")。

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the last processed JSON token in the UTF-8 encoded JSON text.
Docs.value: 上次处理的 JSON 令牌的类型。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TrySkip() cil managed

Docs.summary: Tries to skip the children of the current JSON token.
Docs.returns: if there was enough data for the children to be skipped successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
如果读取器没有足够的数据来完全跳过当前令牌的子级, 则会将其重置为在调用方法之前所处的状态。
当<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.TokenType> 为<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.PropertyName?displayProperty=nameWithType>时, 读取器首先移动到属性值。
当<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.TokenType> (最初或前进后) 为<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartArray?displayProperty=nameWithType>时, 读取器前进到匹配<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.EndObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>的或<xref:System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.EndArray?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
对于所有其他标记类型, 读取器不会移动。 在下一次调用<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.Read>后, 读取器将在下一个值 (在数组中时)、下一个属性名称 (在对象中) 或结束数组/对象标记。

Docs.exception:
An invalid JSON token was encountered while skipping, according to the JSON RFC.
- or -
The current depth exceeds the recursive limit set by the maximum depth.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSequence As ReadOnlySequence(Of Byte)

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload. If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span. Otherwise, contains the token value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
如果<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.HasValueSequence>为`false` ,`ValueSequence`则为空。 因此, 仅当`ValueSequence` <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.HasValueSequence>为时`true`才访问。 否则, 必须从<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ValueSpan>访问令牌值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ValueSpan As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)
public: property ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> ValueSpan { ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the last processed token as a ReadOnlySpan<byte> slice of the input payload. If the JSON is provided within a ReadOnlySequence<byte> and the slice that represents the token value fits in a single segment, then contains the sliced value since it can be represented as a span. Otherwise, the contains the token value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
如果<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.HasValueSequence>为`true` ,<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ValueSpan>则为空。 因此, 仅当`ValueSpan` <xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.HasValueSequence>为时`false`才访问。 否则, 必须从<xref:System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader.ValueSequence>访问令牌值。

Public Function ValueTextEquals (utf8Text As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As Boolean
